inclusion.criterion: Moderate mitral regurgitation in the judgment of the clinical site echocardiographer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CAD that is amenable to CABG and a clinical indication for revascularization
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any evidence of structural (chordal or leaflet) mitral valve disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prior surgical or percutaneous mitral valve repair
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has severe mitral regurgitation and is planned for mitral valve repair/replacement surgery. However, they have a history of prior mitral valve repair which makes them likely ineligible.
